Name: Jigsaw Souls
About the game: Daltoniel in his daily routine, from working out, wearing the costumes of his favorite heroes or eating his powerful enemies in delicious meals that he prepared himself, how good is it to enjoy life being a demigod slime. features Jigsaw puzzle having 12 cute illustrations of Daltoniel For each jigsaw puzzle, 3 difficulty levels can be set A relaxing and imersive clean Background Zoom in/Zoom Out Draggable scenario A bunch of game juiciness Relax with a comforting and exclusive lo-fi soundtrack
